are_you_using_a_small_screen?: Are you using a small screen?
auth_not_valid: The authentication policy needs more steps: please contact your administrator for more information
browser_limited_supported: Having troubles? Try a fully supported browser
changePassword_error_block_common_words: Invalid password: password is known to be too common: {{str}}
changePassword_error_block_personal_data: Invalid password: password contains username or other personal data: {{str}}
changePassword_error_minDigitsOrPuncs: Expecting at least {{num}} numeric or punctuation characters
changePassword_error_passwordLocked: Password is locked and can't be changed
credentials_not_valid: Credentials are not valid, please check data and try again
enter_your_username_to_retrieve_recovery: Please enter your username so we may retrieve the recovery email.
glad_to_have_you_back_username: Glad to have you back, {{ username }}!
login_with_app: You can login using the dedicated app for <bold> Android </bold> and  <bold> Iphone, </bold> download your version using the buttons below!
not_have_recovery_email_setup_note: Don’t have a recovery email setup? Please contact your system administrator for support.
offline: You are currently offline, please check your internet connection
proceed_with_the_login_and_change_your_p: You can proceed with the login, but remember to also change your password
recovery_code_send_success: The Recovery code has been send successfully
resend_code_notes: Don’t see the code in your inbox? Wait a couple of minutes or check your spam folder. If you still don’t see it please click on "Resend Code".
send_a_recovery_code_notes: Click on the button below to send a recovery code to that address, use it validate the next request.
server_not_responding: The server is not responding. Please contact your server administator
something_went_wrong: Something went wrong. Please contact your administrator.
still_have_access_to_recovery_email: Do you still have access to {{ recovery_email }}?
trust_device_and_ip: Trust this device and IP address
unsupported_version: The server sent a not valid response. Please contact your server administrator
validation_code_was_sent_to_recovery_ema: The validation code was sent to {{ recovery_email }} and will be valid for 10 minutes. You have {{ recoveryAttemptsLeft }} more attempts. Enter the code in the form below.
wrong_password: Wrong password, please check data and try again
